ygData.messageBody:
as someone who is female and plays *gasp* female toons I can say my HE and DE babes are both hot and I have been known to shelter an entire group of the smaller races under my boobs in the rain or at least that's what the messed up graphics showed. ok it's a game folks if we can't poke fun at the way we're drawn then it's a pretty sorry world. Personally I think the designers are all T&A men cause have you noticed how most of the female mobs when they die they collapse on all fours with their butts sticking in the air while the men just kind of lay there
 
Flaumigavylke
66 Feralkin Epic'd Beastlord
Silver Tears of Flame
 
"Understand your limits, but never limit your understanding"
-------Original Message-------
 
Hey I like females as well =) oh wait you meant playing Female characters my bad =P
 
Seriously though I have no experience with EQ Frontiers since i dot have a PS2 and I'm not sure I wanna give sony anymore cash than they are getting form me already with the EQ1 accounts I have already.  But if the females are anything like the ones on EQ1 and  have the same races go for the High Elf or De chicks they always tend to be sexy to me in my book.  Though the Barbarians have nice top heavy features to em as well =)
 
Yeah i know some of the ladies on this list are probably calling me a typical male pig. Please allow me to assure you ladies I'm not yer typical male. As Wulfric knows I'm a perfect gentleman when it comes to the ladies of our species and I'll not change that ever =)
 
Halyburton

Legion of Vengeance
